content:
RemoteMemberData Struct

Definition

Provides information about a member of a type that components can access across application domain and process boundaries.

In this Article

public struct RemoteMemberData
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
RemoteMemberData

Remarks

The RemoteMemberData structure provides information about a member of an object that implements the IRemoteObjectContract interface.

Fields

DeclaringType

Represents the type that declares the member that this RemoteMemberData describes.

public System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract DeclaringType;

Name

Represents the name of the member that this RemoteMemberData describes.

public string Name;
